direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve managing and querying leverage settings for margin accounts.
Both methods involve querying margin-related data with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods access and retrieve margin-related data, though for different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for querying leverage brackets.
Setting up the margin environment is necessary before querying leverage brackets.
Verifying leverage settings can help in asserting the correctness of the leverage bracket data.
